job.title: Machine Learning/Data Engineer - AWS
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Staffing and Recruiting,Human Resources
job.description: Title: AWS Data/Machine Learning Consultant / 100% Remote Available / $120-200k per year  Location: Remote; office based in NYC  Pay: Up to 200k based on experience  Employment: Full-time permanent position (W2)  I currently have an opening for an AWS Data/ML Consultant who has a strong skillset with Sagemaker, IaC with Terraform or CloudFormation, and Data Lake experience  My Client operates within the Financial sector, regularly working with Fortune 500 companies. They are AWS Advanced Consulting Partners and are in the midst of a hefty expansion in terms of project growth and company growth.  Being that they are a consulting company, great communication skills and an all-star personality is a MUST. Looking to take the next steps of your career? Check out the requirements below!  US Citizen or Green Card Only - no sponsorship at this time If interested in applying for this position, please e-mail your CV/Resume directly to n.lavecchia@jeffersonfrank.com .  Also be sure to include the times you are best available over the next few days so we can coordinate schedules quicker. _____________________________________________________________ AWS / DevOps / Architect / Amazon Web Services  Jefferson Frank is a leader in Niche IT Recruitment with a focus on AWS cloud technologies. We deal with AWS Partners & End Users throughout North America. We have open positions and relationships with some of the top partners and end users throughout the US and offer some excellent opportunities in the AWS space.  I understand the need for discretion and would welcome the opportunity to speak to any AWS candidates considering a new career or job either now or in the future. Confidentiality is of the utmost importance. For more information on available AWS jobs, as well as the AWS market, I can be contacted at n.lavecchia@jeffersonfrank.com.  Please see www.jeffersonfrank.com for more information. AWS, Azure, Cloud, Security, SME, SRE, Site Reliability Engineer, Architect, DevSecOps, DevOps, Engineer, IT, FInancial Services, Kubernetes, Python, Cloud Security, AWS, Security, Networking, Loadbalancing, Firewalls, Monitoring, Development, SLDC, Python, Kubernetes, DevOps, Architect, Full Stack, Java, JavaScript, Node.js, Lambda, API, Big Data, Databases, Glue, Redshift, Data, SageMaker, EKS
